Text:
Great quality, thanks! :D
But where's the CD with episode 28-35?!
appreciated this thank u so much

I'll start by apologizing for my ignorance. My sister has been a Dark Shadows fan since childhood. I'd like to surprise her and burn DVD's of all the episodes. I see these are MP-4 but also states (AVI). Will these play on her DVD player (fairly new model). I found that MP-3 works on mine but not MP-4. Since it also states it is AVI, has it been converted or am I just being stupid? I'd hate to get her excited and then it doesn't work.
